languages.text: "Твое Суждение принято. Прощай, {name}". {n}Паскаль закрывает глаза и спокойно встречает ваш удар.{/n} "Единица Паскаль Ханейманн службу завершила".
"Your Judgement is accepted. Farewell, {name}." {n}Pasqal closes his eyes and calmly receives your blow.{/n} "The unit Pasqal Haneumann's service has ended."
languages.original_text: "Твое Суждение принято. Прощай, {name}". {n}Паскаль закрывает глаза и спокойно встречает ваш удар.{/n} "Единица Паскаль Ханейманн службу завершила".

traits.locale_text: "Your Judgement is accepted. Farewell, {name}." {n}Pasqal closes his eyes and calmly receives your blow.{/n} "The unit Pasqal Haneumann's service has ended."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「御身の審判を受け入れます。お別れです、{name}様」{n}パスカルは目を閉じ、穏やかにあなたの一撃を受けた。{/n}「当ユニット、パスカル・ヘニュマンの献身は終わった」
languages.original_text: "Your Judgement is accepted. Farewell, {name}." {n}Pasqal closes his eyes and calmly receives your blow.{/n} "The unit Pasqal Haneumann's service has ended."

traits.locale_text: 「御身の審判を受け入れます。お別れです、{name}様」{n}パスカルは目を閉じ、穏やかにあなたの一撃を受けた。{/n}「当ユニット、パスカル・ヘニュマンの献身は終わった」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我接受你的判断。永别了，{name}。”{n}帕斯卡闭上眼睛，平静地接受了你的致命一击。{/n}“帕斯卡·哈努曼这一单位的服务已经结束。”
languages.original_text: "Your Judgement is accepted. Farewell, {name}." {n}Pasqal closes his eyes and calmly receives your blow.{/n} "The unit Pasqal Haneumann's service has ended."

traits.locale_text: “我接受你的判断。永别了，{name}。”{n}帕斯卡闭上眼睛，平静地接受了你的致命一击。{/n}“帕斯卡·哈努曼这一单位的服务已经结束。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Votre jugement est accepté. Adieu, {name}. » {n}Pasqal ferme les yeux et encaisse votre coup sans rechigner.{/n} « Le service de l'unité Pasqal Haneumann a pris fin. »
languages.original_text: "Your Judgement is accepted. Farewell, {name}." {n}Pasqal closes his eyes and calmly receives your blow.{/n} "The unit Pasqal Haneumann's service has ended."

traits.locale_text: « Votre jugement est accepté. Adieu, {name}. » {n}Pasqal ferme les yeux et encaisse votre coup sans rechigner.{/n} « Le service de l'unité Pasqal Haneumann a pris fin. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Acepto su Juicio. Adiós, {name}». {n}Pasqal cierra los ojos y recibe tu golpe con serenidad.{/n} «El servicio de la unidad Pasqal Haneumann ha llegado a su fin».
languages.original_text: "Your Judgement is accepted. Farewell, {name}." {n}Pasqal closes his eyes and calmly receives your blow.{/n} "The unit Pasqal Haneumann's service has ended."

traits.locale_text: «Acepto su Juicio. Adiós, {name}.» {n}Pasqal cierra los ojos y recibe tu golpe con serenidad.{/n} «El servicio de la unidad Pasqal Haneumann ha llegado a su fin».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Euer Urteil wird akzeptiert. Lebt wohl, {name}." {n}Pasqal schließt die Augen und empfängt in aller Ruhe deinen Hieb.{/n} "Der Dienst der Einheit Pasqal Haneumann ist beendet."
languages.original_text: "Your Judgement is accepted. Farewell, {name}." {n}Pasqal closes his eyes and calmly receives your blow.{/n} "The unit Pasqal Haneumann's service has ended."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Urteil wird akzeptiert. Lebt wohl, {name}." {n}Pasqal schließt die Augen und empfängt in aller Ruhe deinen Hieb.{/n} "Der Dienst der Einheit Pasqal Haneumann ist beendet."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Hükmünüz kabul ediliyor. Elveda {name}." {n}Pasqal, gözlerini kapayıp darbeni sakince karşılıyor.{/n} "Pasqal Haneumann biriminin hizmeti sonlanmıştır."
languages.original_text: "Your Judgement is accepted. Farewell, {name}." {n}Pasqal closes his eyes and calmly receives your blow.{/n} "The unit Pasqal Haneumann's service has ended."

traits.locale_text: "Hüküm'ünüz kabul ediliyor. Elveda {name}." {n}Pasqal gözlerini kapıyor ve darbeni sakince karşılıyor.{/n} "Pasqal Haneumann biriminin hizmeti sonlanmıştır."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
